effect: Penalty –1 to all rolls for Agility.
Penalty –1 to all rolls for Wits.
Penalty –1 to all rolls for Empathy.
Make an INSIGHT/SENSE EMOTION roll every Quarter Day (4+ hours) spent sleeping. Failure means that the sleep doesn't count.
You can only sleep during the light part of the day.
You are terrified by something related to what Broke you. The GM decides what it is. You suffer 1 point of damage to Wits each round within Near range of the object of your phobia.
You must drink wine or mead every day, or suffer 1 point of damage to Agility.
Every turn (15 minutes) in a confined environment, you suffer 1 point of damage to Wits.
You cannot stop yourself from lying. About everything. *(The effect should be roleplayed.)*
You are certain that someone is out to get you. *(The effect should be roleplayed.)*
You are totally convinced of something that is totally untrue. *(For example that a certain kin doesn't exist.)*
Make an INSIGHT/SENSE EMOTION roll every Quarter Day (4+ hours). If you fail, you suffer a powerful hallucination. The GM determines the details.
Your personality is altered in a fundamental way. Determine how together with the GM. *(The effect should be roleplayed.)*
You lose all memory, and cannot recollect who you or the other adventurers are. *(The effect should be roleplayed.)*
You stare blankly into oblivion, and do not respond to any stimuli.
Your heart stops, and you die of pure fright.
